  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_106168</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106168</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces acting on a rocket</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzwingt das Fungieren auf einer Rakete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force l'action sur une fusée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força agir em um foguete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza comportarsi su un razzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε έναν πύραυλο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza actuar en un cohete</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the forces, due to the gravitational pull of the Earth and the Moon, acting on a rocket travelling towards the Moon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">astronauts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocket</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Kräfte, wegen der 
Gravitationszugkraft der Masse und des Mondes und fungiert auf einer 
Rakete, die in Richtung zum Mond reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les forces, dues à la 
gravitation de la terre et de la lune, agissant sur une fusée 
voyageant vers la lune.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as forças,  devido à 
tração gravitacional da terra e da lua, agindo em um foguete que 
viaja para a lua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le forze, dovuto la 
attrazione gravitazionale della terra e della luna, agente su un razzo
che viaggia verso la luna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις δυνάμεις, λόγω στο 
βαρύτητας τράβηγμα της γης και του φεγγαριού, ενεργώντας σε έναν 
πύραυλο που ταξιδεύει προς το φεγγάρι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las fuerzas,  debido a 
la gravitación de la tierra y de la luna, actuando en un cohete que 
viaja hacia la luna.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronauten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
